Tamanu:
Literal `
These are the Conditions for ${Patient.firstname} ${Patient.lastName} for ${Condition.code.coding[0].display}. Please review the data for more detail.
`
Example: These are the Conditions for ${Patient.firstname} ${Patient.lastName} for ${Condition.code.coding[0].display}. Please review the data for more detail.

Tamanu:
IF PatientCondition.resolved != true then return 'active'
else return 'resolved'

IF (PatientCondition exists for this patient)
then Literal `http://snomed.info/sct`
else Literal `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips`

IF (PatientCondition exists for this patient)
then PatientCondition.condition.code
else Literal `no-problem-info`

IF (PatientCondition exists for this patient)
then PatientCondition.condition.name
else Literal `No information about current problems`
